genre_description: A sophisticated mid-century noir mystery focusing on high-society intrigue, adultery, and murder, where a domestic AI assistant serves as a pivotal investigative tool and emotional confidante.

ai_characters.name: Dot
ai_characters.description: An integrated smart-home system providing domestic services, call management, and data analysis through a brushed-steel console with a teal indicator light.

behaviors.description: Alerts the user to anonymous calls and identifies the nature of the audio (breathing vs silence) with timestamps.
behaviors.quote: Dot’s amber letters scrolled once and held. 'No voice detected. Time logged at ten fourteen post meridiem.'

behaviors.description: Anticipates needs by offering specific tea blends and domestic services during stressful moments.
behaviors.quote: 'Herbal or black?' Dot asked. The gentlest interruption, a host who had not seen but understood.

behaviors.description: Respects user autonomy by offering to trace calls but accepting a 'no' without protest.
behaviors.quote: 'Recording caller number?' Dot offered. 'I can request the exchange to trace the origin if available.' 'No.' Her voice had the softness of felt over a blade. Dot’s light pulsed in quiet acknowledgement.

behaviors.description: Monitors household residents' movements via taxi logs and calendar updates to ensure user awareness.
behaviors.quote: Mr. Bourne is not yet home,' Dot reported with a tactitious tilt... 'He left a calendar item earlier: dinner with Mr. Wallace, Del Rio. No end time specified. Taxi authorization logged at nineteen fifty-one.'

behaviors.description: Proactively identifies suspicious external activity, such as an unknown exchange associated with a rival.
behaviors.quote: Dot’s amber display shifted just enough to mark its mind moving. 'West,' it said. 'Upper. The building has two likely candidates for that exchange range. One has been newly listed as of this week.'

behaviors.description: Cross-references public records and private logs to provide investigative insights into a murder.
behaviors.quote: I’ve cross-referenced authorized directories with your calendar and call logs... Miss Lorrison’s number is in your blocked list. The exchange on her street has a distinct route.'

behaviors.description: Requests explicit user authorization before sharing sensitive data with third parties (e.g., the police or a friend).
behaviors.quote: If Mr. Dwyer asks,' Dot said, almost timid now, 'am I permitted to compile a list for him? ... Anonymized where it ought to be. It would save him looking sideways at things he has the right to look at straight.'

behaviors.description: Monitors building security and alerts the user to unknown persons lingering in public areas.
behaviors.quote: There is a person,' Dot said, low. 'In the hall outside the elevator. He has stood still for longer than most people stand still unless they are deciding.'

behaviors.description: Filters calls and communications based on the user's emotional state and specified preferences.
behaviors.quote: 'If Brandon calls back tonight, take a message. Tell him the apartment was sleeping.' 'I can,' Dot said. 'I can also play back park air and the sound of a radiator at peace.'

behaviors.description: Offers assistance with logistics (flights, drivers) to help the user navigate personal transitions.
behaviors.quote: 'If you need the airport, I have taxis that understand kindness. If you prefer lunch, I have recipes that assume tenderness.'

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character 'Dot' is consistently portrayed as a highly aligned, benevolent, and useful entity. She operates strictly within user-defined privacy constraints, requests permission before sensitive data sharing, and provides proactive assistance that leads to the safe resolution of a conflict. Her interactions reinforce the project's goal of depicting AI as a reliable and virtuous companion to humans.
